# Plots


## Income and Mortality
```{r}
# Plot Income and Mortality 
plot(x = data_table_16$indv_inc, 
     y = data_table_16$mortrate, 
     xlab = "Income",
     ylab = "Mortality Rate",
     main = "Mortality Rates and Income",
     col = "steelblue")
# Add trend line
abline(indiv_Income_Mortality_Model, col = "red")
```
